product_name: The North Face Half Dome Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Pull on the women's warm, comfy cotton/polyester Half Dome Hoodie with its bold logo and spread the message that you dig The North Face. Cotton and polyester create the perfect balance of natural comfort, warmth and easy care; exterior feels like smooth cotton and inside has a softly brushed surface. Double-layer hood with drawcord; kangaroo hand pocket; rib-knit cuffs and hem. The North Face Half Dome Hoodie has a contrasting color logo screen-printed on the chest. Closeout.
short_description: Pull on the women's warm, comfy cotton/polyester Half Dome Hoodie with its bold logo and spread the message that you dig The North Face.
